resources.string: APP require Location permission to get Wi-Fi information. \nClick to request permission
Please turn on GPS to get Wi-Fi information.
Current Wi-Fi connection is 5G, but the device just support 2.4G.
Device don\'t support 5G Wi-Fi, please make sure the currently connected Wi-Fi is 2.4G, or you can try multicast
On Android M or higher version, App can\'t get Wi-Fi connection information if you forbid Location permission.
